mapping.name: ${province_en}_VERIFICATION_REPORT_%%Y%%M%%D%%H%%m%%S.csv
mapping.templet: 电信数据核查模板VERIFICATION_REPORT_四期.ftl
mapping.sql: SELECT T.PRO_NAME AS "省份", T.ASKREPORTFILE AS "要求上报文件", T.ACTUALREPORTFILE AS "实际上报文件", T.REPORT_PERSON AS "上报人", TO_CHAR(T.REPORT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "上报时间", T.REPORT_TYPE AS "上报类型" FROM MOD_VERIFICATION_REPORT T

mapping.name: ${province_en}_VERIFICATIONFILL_ACK__%%Y%%M%%D%%H%%m%%S.csv
mapping.templet: 电信数据核查模板VERIFICATION_RECEIPT_四期.ftl
mapping.sql: SELECT T.PRO_NAME AS "省份", T.VER_NO AS "核查单号", T.RECEIPT_PERSON AS "回执人", TO_CHAR(T.RECEIPT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS "回执时间" FROM MOD_VERIFICATIONFILL_ACK T

mapping.name: ${province_en}_VERIFICATIONFILL_EXPLAIN_%%Y%%M%%D%%H%%m%%S.csv
mapping.templet: 电信数据核查模板VERIFICATION_EXPLAIN_四期.ftl
